page.title: 12Garland's Farm.
page.content: At{Garland's Farm}they have no animals except for a dog,and they have 14 cows and calves for fatting.They grow 75 tons of peas,35 tons of oil seed rape, and about 800 tons of winter wheat. They have 2 grain lorries 1 big low loader mobile dryer 7 tractors plus a big roller. 1 hedge cutter. The{West Wratting}equipment is shared with{Garland's Farm.}At the farm there are some hollowed out tree trunks that used to be used for drains in the olden days. It is a family farm.There are 2 men in 1 work shop,3 men drive the machinery so do 3 men from{West {Wratting.}In the summer 4 people from {New Zealand }come to work on the farm.
